item.title: First Post
item.description: First post # I have recently been awarded my Azure IoT Developer Specialty Certification. Little did I know how all encompassing Azure’s offering in this space is. The MS Learning took me well outside of my comfort zone. I was blown away by how incredibly fascinating IoT (and IoTEdge) development and architecture is. I also found myself hacking python to prove my Raspberry PI sensors were working and then hacking .
